story_text: A cheerful baker named Mr. Turner made the best butter tarts in the town.
Every customer loved his work, and they often said his desserts were a real wonder.
story_images: A smiling baker with a chef's hat and apron stands proudly in a bakery, holding a tray of golden butter tarts.
A group of happy customers sitting at a table, enjoying the delicious butter tarts and giving thumbs up.

questions.question: What is the name of the baker?
What do the customers think of the desserts?
